dt-option.name: rowGroup.emptyDataGroup
dt-option.summary: Text to show for rows which have `null`, `undefined` or empty string group data

type.description:
The text that will be shown in the grouping row for the data.
If `null` is given as the value, no grouping row will be shown (since 1.0.3).

dt-option.description: If the data point (`-init rowGroup.dataSrc`) for a row is `null`, `undefined` or an empty string, it will still create a group of similar data, but the label shown is defined by this option.
